  • Method Details

    • addNewUser

      RequestUserDTO addNewUser(SignUpDTO signUpDto, org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile image) throws IOException

      Adds new User to the database and returns it as a DTO object.

      Parameters:
      signUpDto - - User details, including name, username, email and password.
      image - User's image that will be bound to new user.
      Returns:
      User's details excluding password.
      Throws:
      IOException - if adding image is failed.

    • resetPassword

      ResetPassDTO resetPassword(String token, ResetPassDTO resetPassDTO) throws TokenExpiredException, ValuesAreNotEqualException

      Resets User's password.

      Parameters:
      token - for confirming user.
      resetPassDTO - includes 2 passwords for matching and updating it.
      Returns:
      DTO object that include passwords.
      Throws:
      TokenExpiredException - if difference between token creation and current date is more than 24 hours.
      ValuesAreNotEqualException - if passwords in DTO object doesn't match.

    • sendEmail

      void sendEmail(String email) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException, UnsupportedEncodingException

      Sends email to User email.

      Parameters:
      email - where to send.
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      UnsupportedEncodingException

    • checkUserByCredentials

      boolean checkUserByCredentials(String username, String password)

      Check if user is authenticated.

      Parameters:
      username - User's username.
      password - User's password.
      Returns:
      is User authenticated or not.
